basics.summary: A detail-oriented JavaScript developer with two years experience building web apps with a love for problem solving and learning.

Created and managed several Excel spreadsheets that automated financial receipts and recurring monthly bills

work.summary: Personal Project still in active development. A user-friendly bridge website for ex-Pogo.com players to play free online multiplayer contract bridge.
highlights: Leverages Next.js for React server-side rendering and Redux for handling game and site-wide state.
Build on an express server backend that utilizes both RESTful and socket patterns to support real-time chat and game events.
CSS in JS through Styled Components with a custom theme component for uniform styling across the app.

highlights: Taught myself tools such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
